common.utils

类 RadixUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.utils.RadixUtil

  • public class RadixUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    进制转换工具类 create by mulin on 2018/09/08 This class is mainly used for operations related to radix.

        public static byte[] hexCharToByte(char[] hexData)
        将十六进制字符数组转换为字节数组
        参数:
        hexData - 十六进制char[]
        返回:
        byte[]
        抛出:
